name: Colombian Mojito
description: Colombian Mojito by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakal≈çl≈ç Seed Bank is a refreshing and potent phenotype of the legendary landrace, Colombian Gold. Originally grown in the Santa Marta mountains of Colombia, this “mojito cut” exhibits a tropical terpene profile while offering notes of mint and tart citrus that speak to its namesake. Sourced by Masta Cylinda, this sativa-dominant strain hits the consumer between the eyes, leading into a blissful, stoney mental state that lingers in the body for hours. Enjoy Colombian Mojito to improve mood and help abate stress.
descriptionPlain: Colombian Mojito by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakal≈çl≈ç Seed Bank is a refreshing and potent phenotype of the legendary landrace, Colombian Gold. Originally grown in the Santa Marta mountains of Colombia, this “mojito cut” exhibits a tropical terpene profile while offering notes of mint and tart citrus that speak to its namesake. Sourced by Masta Cylinda, this sativa-dominant strain hits the consumer between the eyes, leading into a blissful, stoney mental state that lingers in the body for hours. Enjoy Colombian Mojito to improve mood and help abate stress.

highlightedReviews.text:
Mahalo Leafly 'Ohana (Thank you Leafly Family) for listing this incredible landrace phenotype that has hit da Hawaiian islands and our West Coast 'Ohana (Family) by tropical terpene storm!

Masta Cylinda aka Hilo Hip Hop artist Nick Stylez sourced these magic beans from South America and we went to phenohunting through one of the most legendary landrace strains on Earth to find a suitable Makuahine (Mother) for our extract artists supa strain Hawaiian Mayan Gold...Mission Accomplished!!

She reeks of lime and mint ergo da MMJ moniker Mojito cut.

One slice into this beauty and da whole area will be completely reeking of flavor that will linger after Elvis has left da building perhaps even later...

Born down by the equator Colombian Gold Mojito cut is what a sweaty salsa dance with a beautiful Wahine (Woman) should smell like...if you have a pocket full of Colombian Gold Mojito cut then get your salsa dance on and share the magical moment with a friend or 3...we did...üòâ

üíöColombian Gold Mojito cut can be found at Amazon Organics and Tj's Dispensaries in her original landrace gloryüíö

Oh my! 

Another of the doc‚Äôs favourite strains, I was lucky to procure this from an op in Canada. Boy does it hit the spot, right... right there!!!

In the jar, this smells SO enticing. Raw fruit and fresh pine overload the nose quickly and release with the pine lingering. 

Starting at 180C in the vape, first few notes are tangy pine, minty and sweet fruit. That classic pinene profile you remember from other strains like Love Potion #1. After a while it turns into a herby but sweet pine concoction - definitely mellows out over time but stays tangy, sweet and herby. 

15 - 20 minutes in and the euphoria kicks in, gently, and brings with it the opening of that tight chest from your anxiety and stress. Goodbye worries of the day, hello talking shit and feeling good for the next few hours :)

This didn‚Äôt smash me sideways, but definitely deserves the 5 stars! Super gentle and clear high that leaves your faculties pretty much intact. I would try this is it comes available near you, even if you prefer a sativa
